components.description:
A person with blond hair. This emoji maintains blond hair no matter which skin tone is chosen. This emoji may be used to talk about blonds in a gender-inclusive way.

Previously displayed as a man with blond hair on all platforms, though shown as a woman with blond hair in earliest Google, Microsoft, and Samsung designs.

Variants include üë±‍‚ôÄÔ∏è Woman with Blond Hair and üë±‍‚ôÇÔ∏è Man with Blond Hair.
components.title: Person with Blond Hair

title: Person with Blond Hair

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Portrait and role symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A person with blond hair,¬†which tends to appear as yellow. Displayed¬†as a man on all platforms, this emoji keeps blond hair no matter which  http://emojipedia.org/person-with-blond-hair/
emoji_net_data.name: blond-haired person

bn:00098578a: Being or having light colored skin and hair and usually blue or grey eyes

bn:00106354a: Of, relating to, or denoting a member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces gametes (spermatozoa) that perform the fertilizing function in generation

bn:00012569n: A boy is a young male human, usually child or adolescent.
A young male person, usually a child or teenager.
A young male human; a male child or young adult.

bn:00046516n: A person, especially as one among many.
An individual is a person or a specific object.
A single physical human being as a legal subject, as opposed to a legal person such as a corporation.
A human; someone susceptible to death.

A person is a being, such as a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood, which in turn is defined differently by different authors in different disciplines, and by different cultures in different times and places.
A person that will die eventually.
A being, such as a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood
Abstract term defining a being, e.g. a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood (not for use with "instance of" [P31], instead use "human" [Q5])
An individual; usually a human being.

bn:00011342n: A light and yellowish, brownish or golden hair color.
A person with dark blond hair.
A person with fair skin and hair
Blond or blonde, or fair hair, is a hair color characterized by low levels of the dark pigment eumelanin.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

apple_vendor_description: The person with blond hair emoji on Apple devices is characterized by its bright, sun-kissed locks that catch the light with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. The smooth gradients and soft rounded edges of the face create a friendly and approachable individual. This emoji, with its cheerful appearance, is often used to represent youthfulness, optimism, or simply to add a touch of lightheartedness to conversations.
